name: DUEL NATURES
description:
DUEL NATURES

An Avatar Inspired Face-off

Hello! This is a game that was collaboratively (and impulsively made) on twitter by the question of hey, how would an Avatar: the Last Airbender TTRPG play like, if you specifically focused on the element’s battles, and how the elements showed not only a cultural and political tension but also the tendency of certain character traits.

This is Maria (specifically) and I honestly enjoyed thinking about this idea so much that I just had to somehow put this on itch in Jan2021 even if this gdoc form was born back in Jul2020.

As this is not a full fleshed out game (strictly), I can’t really describe the play-flow officially, (as I’m not the only author) but I can have a pretty good guess and suggestion to what would make things easy for play. 

-

This is a GM-less game and is best played for 2-4players. It’s played in rounds where 2 players engage in a combat where they use EARTH WIND FIRE WATER - BENDING to sort out their emotions while in hypothetical combat. The players not engaged in combat, choose setting elements and may create additional exposition if they wish.

-

PLAY THIS IF:

- YOU WANT TO DO SOME QUICK ELEMENTAL INSPIRED DUELS

- WAX POETIC About your emotions and character background via some elemtal themes and motifs 

-

*as this collectively written all proceeds of this game will go to homeless children organization called Tiny Blessings:  instagram.com/tinyblessings
